title: E-cigarette ban now in place in Lincoln
text:
We'll send breaking news and news alerts to you as as they happen!

Sign up!
meta_description: LINCOLN, Neb. (AP) — Electronic cigarette use is now prohibited in places of employment and indoor public places in Lincoln.
